poster: G o g g l e s
title: NO LOSS PREVENTION?
body: Ok so everyone in the game DC's. So when it reconnects Jayce and Ahri just left because Riot messed up their server. So it was a 3v5. Thanks riot for ruining ranked game and getting me even more close to a demotion :) You probably wont even read this let alone do anything about it.

replies.body: Yup, that's the point of downvoting, prevents stuff being seen.
Take action and email/message the riot support services about the issue. If you think riot didn't do anything about it let your voice be heard and let them assist you with it.
